name: math for kids: multiplication tables
description:
Mathematics for children is a series of educational games aimed at children with the aim of developing their abilities in mathematics.

This version of the game is designed to teach the multiplication tables in an easy and fun way.

Game features

⭐️ An easy and fun way for children to learn the whole multiplication table
⭐️ Display multiplication tables in several formats to facilitate memorization
⭐️ Over 40 varied stages in the questions with varying degrees of difficulty
⭐️ Prizes are awarded upon completion of a set of stages
⭐️ Simple, attractive graphics for children drawn from everyday life in school
⭐️ Supported languages: Arabic, English, French, and Spanish
⭐️ The game is completely free and safe for children

The game is divided into two main parts, the Learn section and the Play section.

Learn section: through this section, the child can display the multiplication tables from 1 to 12 to learn, memorize and review them, and then perform exercises related to the displayed table.

Play section: there are a set of stages that a child must pass. Each stage consists of a set of questions and the child must answer them correctly within the specified time in order for him to play the next stage. Upon crossing a group of stages, a new prize will be awarded in recognition of the child's performance in the game.

The game is under continuous development, so we welcome all your constructive suggestions and your inquiries. We hope that you like the game. 👌
